file_content.text: Thank you so much.
Please, be careful. We've lost too many people already.
Sorry--can't talk now.
...Don't take off--I repeat, do not take off! Anti-aircraft cannons are still active!
The Regulators' anti-aircraft guns are destroyed. It's safe to fly.
I can't believe it! I thought... I was starting to think we'd never catch a break.
Thank you. Thank you so much. I've got to start getting the word out--we've got a lot of people to get moving.
Attention all outposts: The Regulators' anti-aircraft guns have been destroyed! You are safe to fly. I repeat: It's safe to fly!
No choice--place is tearing apart! If we don't leave now, we might never get to!
We're up... all clear. Heading to zero-seven-zero for rendezvous with--
Ahh!
Banlon! Come in, Banlon! Please... please come in....
If there are any survivors, I'll bring them back. Where did they crash?
Let me help.
Between mesas... it's no use. They're all gone.
Your friend is not lost. In the Force, nothing is lost.
Don't despair.
I... I hope you're right.
If you've got any search-and-rescue teams available, let's get them moving.
Get your rescue teams prepped.
It's no use. They'd just get shot down, too.
Always a shame to hear a fellow pilot go down. You've got my sympathies.
That's rough.
I...oh. Thank you.
I don't understand. What just happened?
What's going on here?
Will you sit here in tears? Or will you punish the people responsible?
Crying does nothing.
Don't you think we've tried?
Impatience always leads to unpleasant consequences.
Such a foolish waste.
No discipline at all. No wonder the mercenaries rolled right over this place.
Such a shoddy operation.
We're not soldiers! What were we supposed to do?
Sounds like your buddy wasn't much of a pilot.
You should've hired a pro.
How can you say that?
That's the fifth transport the Regulator mercenaries have shot down. Must be... sixty, seventy people they've killed in the last hour!
We've sent dozens of volunteers to take down the anti-aircraft guns, but the mercenaries... there's just too many of them. It'd take an army.
We aren't quite an army, but we'll take those guns down--I promise.
Leave it to us.
You don't need an army. You just need me.
Leave it to me.
If it will put a smile back on that pretty face, I'll handle it.
[Flirt] Don't you worry.
I'll take those guns down so fast, you won't believe your eyes.
Prepare to be amazed.
Don't look at me. [Refuse Quest]
You're... serious. All right, if you're sure--let's see what we can do.
If you want to try to take those guns down, great--but a lot of good people have died trying. This isn't a joke.
The only way to reach the mercenaries' base is by air. We'll need a diversion so their AA guns don't shoot you down.
If we remote-pilot one of the speeders as a decoy, you might make it. But then you'll have to deal with all the mercs.... You're really up for this?
We have to destroy those guns before anyone else gets hurt.
There's no other choice.
Charging headlong into crazy situations is a hobby of mine.
It will be fun!
Someone has to deal with this, and you're obviously not capable of dealing with anything.
Only because you're too weak.
We're sending the decoy in to draw the anti-aircraft guns' fire--hurry!
The decoy has been destroyed! They're changing targets--take evasive action!
Please, just... be careful.
I hope you're good at it.
We'll get the decoy speeder up in the air and stay in touch with you over comm. Good luck.
I'm doing my best. We all are.
These are the coordinates to the Regulators base. They have it guarded like a fortress--please, please be careful.
And if you manage to destroy the anti-aircraft guns... just be sure you make it back in one piece. Good luck.
